## Record\_2 class

Public interface to a Record.

A Record is a collection of name,value pairs and represents data from a backend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Record 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(rec)](./forms42core.record_2._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Record</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [deleted](./forms42core.record_2.deleted.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Is record in an deleted state |
|  [inserted](./forms42core.record_2.inserted.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Is record in an inserted state |
|  [recno](./forms42core.record_2.recno.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | The record number |
|  [response](./forms42core.record_2.response.md) | <code>readonly</code> | any | Get the response from the last operation on the backend |
|  [state](./forms42core.record_2.state.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [RecordState](./forms42core.recordstate.md) | State of record |
|  [synchronized](./forms42core.record_2.synchronized.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Has the record been synchronized with the backend |
|  [updated](./forms42core.record_2.updated.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Is record in an updated state |

|  [setRequired(field, flag)](./forms42core.record_2.setrequired.md) |  | Set required state for a given field |
|  [setStyle(field, style, value)](./forms42core.record_2.setstyle.md) |  | Set a style for a given field |
|  [setTag(field, tag)](./forms42core.record_2.settag.md) |  | Change the tag input, span, div ... for the given field |
|  [setValue(field, value)](./forms42core.record_2.setvalue.md) |  | Set the field value. This operation neither locks the record, nor marks it dirty |
